jenkem.shared.color
Class Sample

java.lang.Object
  jenkem.shared.color.Sample

public final class Sample
extends Object

Represents the RGBcolors of four pixels from the provided image. TL | TR ---+--- BL | BR

calculateRgb

public static int[] calculateRgb(com.google.gwt.canvas.dom.client.ImageData id,
                                 int x,
                                 int y,
                                 int contrast,
                                 int brightness)
Calculates the RGB values of the pixel in the provided imageData at position x, y and applies the provided contrast and brightness.

Parameters:
id - ImageData
x - the target pixel column
y - the target pixel row
contrast - is multiplied with the result
brightness - is added to the result
Returns:
an int[] of size 3 with the values for red, green and blue.

keepInRange

public static int keepInRange(int colorComponent)
Makes sure that the provided color is kept in range between 0 and 255.

Parameters:
colorComponent - value after correction
Returns:
value of the provided colorComponent between 0 and 255
